verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thank You for the cross Lord newline Thank you for the price You paid newline Bearing all my sin and shame newline In love You came newline And gave amazing grace

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thank You for this love Lord newline Thank You for the nail pierced hands newline Washed me in Your cleansing flow newline Now all I know newline Your forgiveness and embrace

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Worthy is the Lamb newline Seated on Your throne newline Crown You mow with many crowns newline You reign victorious newline High and lifted up newline Jesus Son of God newline The Darling of heaven crucified newline Worthy is the Lamb newline Worthy is the Lamb
